newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Investec revamps banking operations.
newsitem.headline: Investec revamps banking operations.

text.p: Investec Bank Ltd said on Friday it would implement a restructure of the group's banking operations, consolidating them under Investec Merchant Bank with effect from March 31.

It said the restructure, which would simplify the group's operating structures and was in line with global trends, would have no financial effect on Investec members. It would also not change the effective shareholdings of Investec or its subsidiary companies.
Banking operations are currently split between Investec Bank and Investec Merchant Bank.

Following the restructure, the Investec Bank would change its name to Investec Group Ltd to reflect its changed status as a listed bank controlling company and Investec Merchant Bank would change its name to Investec Bank Ltd, the bank said.
